title: Why Marvel Games Is Dominating - Kinda Funny E3 2017 Live Show
description:
Marvel's Mike Jones and Bill Rosemann stop by the GameSpot Co-Op Stage to talk with Kinda Funny about Marvel's plan when it comes to games.

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1
